mapper.select: SELECT R.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , R.REST_ATTD_CODE , R.REST_TYPE_CODE , R.REST_TYPE_NAME , TO_CHAR(R.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') START_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE , R.NUMBER_OF_DAYS , R.COST , R.CAUSE , R.APPLOVAL_STATUS , R.REJECT_CAUSE , R.START_TIME , R.END_TIME FROM REST_ATTD R , EMP E WHERE R.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND R.REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE
